mapper.select: SELECT s.name speciesName, p.profile_img profileImg, p.name, p.gender FROM pets p, species s WHERE p.species_no = s.no AND p.user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pets(no, user_no, species_no, name, gender, profile_img, regdate) VALUES (pets_seq.nextval, #{userNo}, null, #{name}, #{gender}, #{profileImg}, systimestamp)
